name: Splitception
description:
You are a robot who fell into a "techno-abyss" and your overseers have set up a series of obstacles and levels for you to pass through for a secret experiment named "splitception".

you cannot look through your eyes but can only look at yourself from the side and front on different screens.

this game is about focus, commitment, and good eyes! what will you do in this challenging game?

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

V- Split the Screen

Heart Coin - Fills the Health

XP Coin - Gives you 1 XP

Heart Box - Gives you 1 heart only for once

Skull Box - Takes 1 Heart

Laser - Takes 2 Hearts

Fall Down - Takes 1 Heart

X Box - Resets your score and defaults your stats

Credits :
